DOC.brief_summary: This observational study ass health behavior Physicians medical practice Germany . Physicians ask questionnaire ( self-report ) health behavior , self-diagnostics self-medication case sickness . We send questionnaire 1000 General Practitioners 300 medical specialist Germany . We expect response rate 25-30 % . After electronically data-entry run descriptive analysis primary outcome . Results may provide good understand Physicians health behavior .
